description:
𝗦𝗢𝗠𝗘𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗡𝗚 𝗠𝗜𝗦𝗦𝗜𝗡𝗚? 
𝗥𝗘𝗤𝗨𝗘𝗦𝗧 𝗔 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘 𝗢𝗡 𝗧𝗛𝗘 𝗙𝗢𝗥𝗨𝗠 
(service URL below)

---

Tiptap 🩰 is a rich text editor that gives you control over of your text editor. 


✅ Demo: https://tiptap-demo.bubbleapps.io/version-test/doc/demo


𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦

𝗠𝗘𝗡𝗨𝗦
Fully customizable menus

- Top menu
- Bubble menu: highlight a word and this menu pops up.
- Floating menu: appears in an empty line.

𝗞𝗘𝗬𝗕𝗢𝗔𝗥𝗗 𝗦𝗛𝗢𝗥𝗧𝗖𝗨𝗧𝗦
Both for classical editor and markdown. You can set a paragraph to Heading1 either by typing ⌘ + ⌥ + 𝟏  or by adding # at the beginning of a paragraph.
See all of them here: https://tiptap.dev/api/keyboard-shortcuts


𝗕𝗘𝗔𝗨𝗧𝗜𝗙𝗨𝗟 𝗧𝗔𝗜𝗟𝗪𝗜𝗡𝗗 𝗧𝗬𝗣𝗢𝗚𝗥𝗔𝗣𝗛𝗬 𝗦𝗧𝗬𝗟𝗜𝗡𝗚
The text inside the editor is styled according to TailwindCSS's Typography styles.


𝗧𝗘𝗫𝗧 𝗙𝗢𝗥𝗠𝗔𝗧𝗦
- Bold, Italics, Strikethrough
- Headings 1 through 6
- blockquotes
- lists
- task lists
- Images
- code blocks


𝗢𝗨𝗧𝗣𝗨𝗧
- HTML, clean
- Plain text
- JSON

𝗔𝗨𝗧𝗢𝗕𝗜𝗡𝗗𝗜𝗡𝗚
name: Rich text editor (Tiptap.dev)
plugin_instructions:
1. Place the element on the page
2. Feed it some initial content (plain text or HTML)
3. Save the HTML as output

Extras:
- build and wire your own menu
- floating menu
- bubble menu
